title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.5 - Notification to applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.5 - Notification to applicants

State Regulations
(a) If an application for services is
rejected by the department for not meeting the requirements set forth in
section
345.4
of this Part, the applicant
shall be notified of the rejection in writing by the department. The notice
shall specify the reason(s) for the rejection. (b) Applicants who are custodial parents of
minor children shall be advised of the availability of support collection and
enforcement services through their local district support collection unit, pursuant to section
111-g
of
the Social Services Law and section
347.17
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
345.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
